item.title: Getting started
item.description: Installation Installing SlimFit Let’s make sure Composer is set up as expected. You should use a latest stable version of Composer composer create-project khanhicetea/slimfit your-folder-project Setup webserver Next, assuming you have a popular webserver like Apache2 or Nginx Apache 2 : just point the document root of virtualhost to public folder and enable rewrite mod if you want to use rewrite url feature. Nginx : use this sample site config, (replace the fastcgi_pass if you use UNIX sock) server { listen 80; server_name slimfit.
